availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Armstead B. Davis (Carter County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Carter County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Moses H. Davis and Mildred Davis. Resident of Lewis County in 1850. Farm hand in Carter County in 1860. Farmer in Carter County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lewis County, District 2, p. 199A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, p. 157.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, Precinct 2, p. 105A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Carter County, KY, September 1863, p. 74.
